Here is a list of all documented files with brief descriptions:

beastapi/beastrenderpass.h [code]Render Pass specification
beastapi/beastscene.h [code]The api for specifying scenes in beast
beastapi/beaststring.h [code]Beast strings is objects encapsulating strings returned from Beast API functions

beastapi/beasttargetentity.h [code]Target entities, the relationship between an instance and a bake target
